ygData.subject: Possible song ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: Here are a few ideas for some new songs.  Some of these I ve blatantly ripped off from others (wish I could give credit, but I can t remember the names.  You
ygData.messageBody:
Here are a few ideas for some new songs. Some of these I've blatantly
ripped off from others (wish I could give credit, but I can't remember the
names. You know who you are).

* A song that drains all the bards mana (requires full mana?) and teleports
the entire group to a random bard guild. Basically a bard "evac"

* A party CHA increasing song. This would have some interesting uses.

* Chords of Chaos : Radius effect that would randomly alter non-party
"hate-lists" and targets. Some MOBs might frenzy on the bard (or any other
random party member), some MOBs might attack other MOBs, some MOBs might
flee, etc, etc.

Just some ideas... anyone else?

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
